`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { Accordion } from '@mantine/core';

function Demo() {
  // Second item will be opened by default
  return (
    <Accordion defaultValue="item-2">
      <Accordion.Item value="item-1">
        <Accordion.Control>control-1</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-1</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>

      <Accordion.Item value="item-2">
        <Accordion.Control>control-2</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-2</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>
    </Accordion>
  );
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { Accordion } from '@mantine/core';

function Demo() {
  // Both items will be opened by default
  return (
    <Accordion defaultValue={['item-1', 'item-2']}>
      <Accordion.Item value="item-1">
        <Accordion.Control>control-1</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-1</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>

      <Accordion.Item value="item-2">
        <Accordion.Control>control-2</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-2</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>
    </Accordion>
  );
}

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { useState } from 'react';
import { Accordion } from '@mantine/core';

function Demo() {
  const [value, setValue] = useState<string | null>(null);

  return (
    <Accordion value={value} onChange={setValue}>
      <Accordion.Item value="item-1">
        <Accordion.Control>control-1</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-1</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>

      <Accordion.Item value="item-2">
        <Accordion.Control>control-2</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-2</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>
    </Accordion>
  );
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:89,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:89,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { useState } from 'react';
import { Accordion } from '@mantine/core';

function Demo() {
  const [value, setValue] = useState<string[]>([]);

  return (
    <Accordion multiple value={value} onChange={setValue}>
      <Accordion.Item value="item-1">
        <Accordion.Control>control-1</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-1</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>

      <Accordion.Item value="item-2">
        <Accordion.Control>control-2</Accordion.Control>
        <Accordion.Panel>panel-2</Accordion.Panel>
      </Accordion.Item>
    </Accordion>
  );
}

`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { Accordion } from '@mantine/core';

function Demo() {
  return (
    <Accordion
      styles={{
        item: {
          // styles added to all items
          backgroundColor: '#fff',
          border: '1px solid #ededed',

          // styles added to expanded item
          '&[data-active]': {
            backgroundColor: '#ccc',
          },
        },

        chevron: {
          // styles added to chevron when it should rotate
          '&[data-rotate]': {
            transform: 'rotate(-90deg)',
          },
        },
      }}
    >
      {/* ... Accordion items */}
    </Accordion>
  );
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:167,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"D:\\Github\\Private\\limetree\\limeplay-docs\\docs\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-e9a38f7b-1908-4fa3-98a2-e4a18d913cfe.mdx",lineNumber:167,columnNumber:1},this),`
